TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EditorPartDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner

summary.span: 提供对 控件的设计时支持。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的公共实现基本类，用于呈现控件在设计时。 is a public implementation of the base class for the purpose of rendering controls at design time. 它将添加到设计视图中，从关联的控件区域信息的功能，但不会更改父控件的功能。It adds the capability of carrying zone information from the associated control into design view, but does not otherwise change the functionality of the parent control. 当与其他控件设计器中，你可以更改自定义的设计时呈现通过继承的控件和重写方法。As with other control designers, you can change the design-time rendering of custom controls by inheriting from and overriding the method. 如果你想要重写方法，请务必包括基实现，以便保留区域信息。If you want to override the method, be sure to include the base implementation so as to retain zone information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个简单的自定义允许用户更改控件目标控件的属性。The following code example creates a simple custom control that allows the user to change the property of the target control. 关联验证控件，并在其处于隐藏状态的设计时使用一个标签，说明替换用户输入的文本框。The associated validates the control and replaces the user input text box at design time with a label explaining that it is hidden. [!code-csharp[WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview/CS/SecretEditorPart.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview/vb/secreteditorpart.vb#1)] 为了使要呈现的自定义控件，此页必须控件，与要驻留在中的控件和包含自定义控件操作，如在下面的示例所示代码示例。In order for the custom control to render, the page must have a control, an with a for the control to reside in, and a containing a control for the custom to act on, as shown in the following code example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview/CS/Default.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview/vb/default.aspx#2)] 有关编辑模式，可在运行时必须启用页面上。For the to be usable at run time, edit mode must be enabled on the page. 下面的代码示例演示如何执行此操作与代码隐藏文件。The following code example demonstrates how to do so with a code-behind file. [!code-csharp[WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview/CS/Default.aspx.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebPartsDesigners_EditorPartDesigner_Overview/vb/default.aspx.vb#3)]

summary.span: 创建要在设计时呈现的关联的 控件的副本。

span.span: Creates a copy of the associated control to render at design time.

returns.span: 关联的 控件的副本。

span.span: A copy of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写此方法以将区域信息复制到视图控件。This method is overridden to copy zone information to the view control.

summary.span: 验证控件是否驻留在 类型的区域中，然后获取用于在设计时表示控件的标记。

span.span: Verifies that the control resides in a zone of type , and then gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.

returns.span: 用于在设计时表示控件的标记或错误标记（如果控件未驻留在 中）。

span.span: The markup that is used to represent the control at design time, or error markup if the control does not reside in an .
